query: SELECT id, device_code, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_code IN ('TEMP-001', 'PRESS-002', 'VIB-003', 'PWR-004');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SELECT id, device_code, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_code IN ('TEMP-001', 'PRESS-002', 'VIB-003', 'PWR-004');
stdout:
id	device_code	device_name
1	TEMP-001	Temperature Sensor Line 1
60002	PRESS-002	Pressure Sensor B2
60003	VIB-003	Vibration Monitor C3
60004	PWR-004	Power Meter D4
